Text:
thanks  a lot ! 
It's a chm document but I convert it in html

Just wanted to say that this downloaded, for me, in about 12 seconds!
Which, regardless of it's small size, is impressive by any standards.
Shit, I bet that'll still be considered fast when someone (from the future), reads this comment 4 years from now in 2016...
Am I right future Pirate? Is that still considered fast? [I'll try to come back in the future & read your response. Or, I'll be my own time traveler & answer my own question from the past]
